layout.skillsDescription: Here’s a look at the technologies I’m skilled in (or almost)!

bestSkills.title: I love working on...
bestSkills.reactDescription: Experienced in building dynamic, responsive web applications using React and Next.js, with a focus on server-side rendering, static site generation, and efficient routing for enhanced performance.
bestSkills.tailwindDescription: Proficient in using Tailwind CSS to create custom, responsive designs quickly, ensuring clean and scalable UI development with utility-first styling.
bestSkills.pythonDescription: Skilled in Python programming for various applications, from web development to data manipulation, with a focus on clean code and automation.

bio.introduction: I am a versatile person, often described as "multipotential". I have explored different professional horizons, and today I can say that I thrive in various sectors.
bio.skills: My organizational skills and attention to detail are key assets. I take on projects of all sizes and contribute to their development to improve their quality and efficiency.
bio.keyPlayer: I strive to become a key player in every company I work for, not by imposing my ideas, but by relying on the quality of my work.

contact.connect: Let’s connect and make it happen!
contact.invitation: If you have a question, a job opportunity, or a project in mind, don’t hesitate to reach out. I’m eager to connect and discuss how we can work together.
